title: 4J Studios：PlayStation Vita版已提交索尼审核
author: BensonQC
txt_content:
4J Studios: 
We've handed Minecraft: PlayStation Vita Edition over to Sony for final test!
#MinecraftPSVita 
4J Studios：
我们已经将Minecraft: PlayStation Vita版提交给索尼做最终测试了！
#MinecraftPSVita
